Activity: Log in to the system and check emails. Respond to any overnight requests. Review yesterday's progress and notes.
Meeting Preparation: Review the list of gaps in required data elements identified yesterday. Prepare talking points and potential solutions.

Attend meeting with relevant stakeholders (@itpm-1, @ehrdev-1, @da-2, @clinlead-1) to discuss the gaps in required data elements. Present the list of gaps and proposed solutions. Topic: Addressing Gaps in Required Data Elements in EHR Schema
Meeting with @ehrv-1 to discuss the details about the connection between EHR and the new database. Topic: technical details about the connection to the new database
Incorporate feedback from the meeting into the schema design. Modify the schema to include the missing data elements and ensure data integrity.
Lunch Break - A good meal helps with focus.
Continue modifying the schema based on feedback. Ensure all data types are appropriate and consistent across the database.
Begin documenting the changes made to the schema. Update the schema documentation to reflect the new data elements and their definitions.
Test the changes made to the schema by inserting sample data. Verify that the new data elements are correctly stored and retrieved.

Review the test results. Document any issues or errors encountered and plan for resolution tomorrow. Contact @qatest-1 and @qatest-2 to discuss a comprehensive testing plan. Topic: Comprehensive testing plan.
Final check of emails and project management tools. Prepare for tomorrow's tasks.
